prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Pad, Bass, Piano, Drums, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Piano, Synth Pad, Drums, and Bass, but no Guitar.

Style 2:
This composition has Bass, Piano, Synth Pad, and Drums, but no Guitar.

Style 3:
Guitar is absent from this song, which instead includes Drums, Bass, Synth Pad, and Piano.
